MTM.Summary: College courses are proving challenging, leading to reconsideration of future plans.
MTM.Patterns: difficulty with complex subjects, questioning academic path, feeling overwhelmed
MTM.Goals: improve time management, seek academic support, reconsider career choices
MTM.Transition: The complexity of college courses has led to a reassessment of educational and career goals.

short_term.goal: Complete a coding bootcamp or online course to enhance coding skills

long_term: Transition into a technology-related career, focusing on AI development or sustainable tech solutions.

MTM.Summary: Navigating new social dynamics in college.
MTM.Patterns: disconnection from old friends, making new friends, adjusting to new environment
MTM.Goals: strengthen new friendships, maintain old connections, find a social balance
MTM.Transition: The transition to college has led to a shift in social circles.

LTM.Milestone: First significant transition away from high school social circles.
LTM.Implications: Long-term impact on personal identity and social development.
LTM.Lessons: adaptability, importance of maintaining relationships, value of new connections

short_term.goal: Organize a monthly meet-up or event to strengthen new college friendships

long_term: Cultivate a network of diverse, supportive relationships that reflect personal growth and societal changes.

MTM.Summary: Experiencing sleep deprivation and existential questions.
MTM.Patterns: poor sleep, existential crises, questioning happiness
MTM.Goals: improve sleep hygiene, seek mental health support, find personal fulfillment
MTM.Transition: The college environment has led to a reevaluation of well-being practices.

short_term.goal: Establish a consistent sleep schedule and incorporate mindfulness practices

long_term: Develop a holistic approach to well-being, integrating mental health support and personal fulfillment.

MTM.Summary: Concerned about financial independence and expenses in NYC.
MTM.Patterns: high living costs, feeling broke, lack of free time
MTM.Goals: budgeting, seeking part-time work, financial education
MTM.Transition: The realization of high living costs has prompted a shift towards financial responsibility.

short_term.goal: Create and adhere to a detailed budget to manage living expenses in NYC

long_term: Achieve financial independence through strategic investments and savings, potentially leveraging emerging technologies for income generation.

MTM.Summary: Questioning societal norms and personal happiness.
MTM.Patterns: questioning happiness, reflecting on life changes, societal critique
MTM.Goals: self-discovery, defining personal values, seeking authenticity
MTM.Transition: The college experience has sparked a deeper philosophical inquiry into personal life.

short_term.goal: Attend workshops or lectures on philosophy and personal development

long_term: Engage in ongoing self-discovery and philosophical exploration, adapting personal values in response to technological and societal shifts.

MTM.Summary: Struggling with coding and technology coursework.
MTM.Patterns: frustration with coding, difficulty understanding programming, lack of enjoyment
MTM.Goals: improve coding skills, seek additional resources, find motivation in technology
MTM.Transition: The struggle with coding has led to a reevaluation of interest in technology.

short_term.goal: Explore AI-driven development tools to automate coding tasks

long_term: Become proficient in AI-driven software development and contribute to sustainable space exploration technologies.
